mapper.insert: insert tb_todo (title, event_date, description, completed, regdate, user_no, map_filename, attach_filename) values (#{title}, #{eventDate}, #{description}, 'N', now(), #{user.no}, #{mapFilename}, #{attachFilename})
mapper.select: select A.no, A.title, A.event_date as eventDate, A.description, A.completed, A.regdate, A.user_no as "user.no", B.name as "user.name", A.map_filename as mapFilename, A.attach_filename as attachFilename from tb_todo A, tb_user B where A.user_no = #{value} and A.user_no = B.no and A.completed = 'N' order by A.event_date asc

select A.no, A.title, A.event_date as eventDate, A.description, A.completed, A.regdate, A.user_no as "user.no", A.map_filename as mapFilename, A.attach_filename as attachFilename from tb_todo A, tb_user B where A.user_no = B.no and A.no = #{value}
